mapper.select: SELECT u.emp_name, u.emp_email, u.phone_number, e.team, e.position, e.hire_date, e.vacation_balance, e.emp_idx, u.gender, u.home, u.detail_home, ep.f_name, e.pay_grade, us.sign_name FROM employee e INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_idx = e.user_idx LEFT JOIN emppicture ep ON ep.emp_idx = e.emp_idx LEFT JOIN usersign us ON us.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE e.emp_idx = #{emp_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usersign (user_idx, sign_name, sign_path, update_day) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{signatureFileName}, #{signatureFilePath}, NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sign_name = VALUES(sign_name), sign_path = VALUES(sign_path), update_day = NOW()
